[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”7″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-614612″ back_image=”4958″ back_position=”center center” parallax=”yes” overlay_color=”color-614612″ overlay_alpha=”85″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes”]Welcome to Audible Magic,
Silicon Valley’s pioneer in automatic content recognition.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row unlock_row_content=”yes” row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”0″ top_padding=”0″ bottom_padding=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ override_padding=”yes” column_padding=”5″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”2/3″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ el_class=”emmy-tech”][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading text_font=”font-384419″ subheading=”Winning a Technology and Engineering Emmy award for our pioneering automatic content recognition (ACR) services is humbly, a big deal.”]Winning is well, great![/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]As gratifying as accolades and our 33 awarded US patents for our technology are, what drives us is meeting the ever changing needs of our customers.

Audible Magic has been fingerprinting and identifying audio and video content for 20 years. Along the way, we have developed a deep understanding of the nuances and complexities in the digital media ecosystem. We comprehend the concerns and business challenges on both social media platforms (such as Facebook, Twitch and Dailymotion) and content owners (such as Sony, Universal Music, and Disney).

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” back_image=”4985″ back_repeat=”no-repeat” back_position=”center bottom” overlay_color=”color-194699″ overlay_alpha=”28″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/3″ back_size=”cover”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ back_color=”color-144234″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”86″ align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”2″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h3″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-153010″]Empowering our customers is even better.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]With the passing of the European Union’s Article 17, the opportunity to enable the dynamic growth of the digital media ecosystem is imminent. Audible Magic will be there to enable our customers to understand the changes and empower their businesses to embrace the new paradigm. We view ourselves as a key partner to enable the appropriate use and management of copyrighted content from release to monetization to royalty payments and beyond.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”4″ bottom_padding=”4″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”86″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h3″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-153010″ subheading=”Platforms must answer key questions to license and monetize content. Doing this efficiently and accurately is one of the biggest challenges in the digital media ecosystem today.”]Licensing and monetization starts with clarity.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ force_width_grid=”yes” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/3″ link_to=”|||”][vc_icon icon_image=”4746″ heading_semantic=”h6″ text_size=”h5″ text_font=”font-188013″ title=”What is it and who owns it?” mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h3″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-153010″ subheading=”Audible Magic brings its authoritative content registry of more than 25,000,000 media assets from the biggest industry players in video and audio to compare to user-generated content using our industry-standard ACR technology resulting in virtually no false positives — the lowest in the industry.”][/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row which is critical for identifying covers or highly distorted tracks”][/vc_icon][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h6″ text_size=”h6″ text_font=”font-188013″ title=”Identify video without audio and audio without video”][/vc_icon][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h6″ text_size=”h6″ text_font=”font-188013″ title=”Identify live or video on identification is only part of the equation when managing audio and video content on a platform. Audible Magic offers a variety of services to support monetization, licensing, and back-office administration.”]And continues with business decisions to back office.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ position_horizontal=”left” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/3″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h6″ text_size=”h6″ text_font=”font-188013″ title=”Identify the content and rights ownership to use your licenses”][/vc_icon][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h6″ text_size=”h6″ text_font=”font-188013″ title=”Identify a cover of a song to pay royalties to publishers”][/vc_icon][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_icon position=”left” title_aligned_icon=”yes” icon_image=”4569″ heading_semantic=”h6″ text_size=”h6″ text_font=”font-188013″ title=”Identify content and its use, make monetization decisions”][/vc_icon][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ override_padding=”yes” h_padding=”2″ top_padding=”5″ bottom_padding=”5″ back_color=”color-194699″ back_image=”5013″ parallax=”yes” overlay_alpha=”90″ gutter_size=”3″ column_width_percent=”100″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ mobile_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_down=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h1″ text_font=”font-384419″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes” subheading=”Awards are great. But what really revs up our teams of developers, dealmakers, and executives is enabling the ecosystem to come together and to grow the marketplace.”]We’ve got this.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h3″ text_size=”h5″ text_font=”font-555555″ text_color=”color-xsdn” sub_lead=”yes”]We’ve got this.
